se.jguru.nazgul.core.persistence.api

Class JpaPersistenceOperations

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.jguru.nazgul.core.persistence.api.JpaPersistenceOperations
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JpaQueryOperations, PersistenceOperations

    public class JpaPersistenceOperations
extends Object
implements PersistenceOperations
    Generic JPA implementation of the PersistenceOperations interface, delegating all operations to a wrapped EntityManager.
    Author:
    Lennart Jörelid, jGuru Europe AB

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JpaPersistenceOperations(javax.persistence.EntityManager entityManager)
      Creates a new JpaPersistenceOperations instance delegating all operations to the provided EntityManager instance.

      • JpaPersistenceOperations

        public JpaPersistenceOperations(javax.persistence.EntityManager entityManager)
        Creates a new JpaPersistenceOperations instance delegating all operations to the provided EntityManager instance.
        Parameters:
        entityManager - The entity manager which should be used to carry out all Jpa Persistence operations.

                                                   Object primaryKey)
                                            throws PersistenceOperationException
        Acquires a T-type Entity using the provided primary key.
        Specified by:
        findByPrimaryKey in interface JpaQueryOperations
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of Entity expected.
        Parameters:
        entityType - The type of Entity expected.
        primaryKey - The primary key used to acquire the Entity.
        Returns:
        The Entity of type T with the provided primaryKey.
        Throws:
        PersistenceOperationException - if a JPA-related exception occurred while performing the operation.

        public <T extends NazgulEntity> List<T> fireNamedQueryWithResultLimit(String query,
                                                                      int maxResults,
                                                                      Object... parameters)
                                                               throws PersistenceOperationException
        Fires a JPA NamedQuery, returning the maximum given results as a List.
        Specified by:
        fireNamedQueryWithResultLimit in interface JpaQueryOperations
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of Entity expected.
        Parameters:
        query - The name of the JPA NamedQuery to fire.
        maxResults - The maximum number of results returned. Must not be a negative number.
        parameters - The parameters for the NamedQuery.
        Returns:
        The List of resulting Entities.
        Throws:
        PersistenceOperationException - if a JPA-related exception occurred while performing the operation.

      • fireNamedQuery

        public <T extends NazgulEntity> List<T> fireNamedQuery(String query,
                                                       Map<String,Object> parameters)
                                                throws PersistenceOperationException
        Fires a JPA NamedQuery, returning the results as a List.
        Specified by:
        fireNamedQuery in interface JpaQueryOperations
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of Entity expected.
        Parameters:
        query - The name of the JPA NamedQuery to fire.
        parameters - The parameters for the NamedQuery, assuming that the named query contains named parameters matching the key values within the supplied parameters Map.
        Returns:
        The List of resulting Entities.
        Throws:
        PersistenceOperationException - if a JPA-related exception occurred while performing the operation.

      • fireNamedQueryWithResultLimit

        public <T extends NazgulEntity> List<T> fireNamedQueryWithResultLimit(String query,
                                                                      int maxResults,
                                                                      Map<String,Object> parameters)
                                                               throws PersistenceOperationException
        Fires a JPA NamedQuery, returning the maximum given results as a List.
        Specified by:
        fireNamedQueryWithResultLimit in interface JpaQueryOperations
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of Entity expected.
        Parameters:
        query - The name of the JPA NamedQuery to fire.
        maxResults - The maximum number of results returned. Must not be a negative number.
        parameters - The parameters for the NamedQuery, assuming that the named query contains named parameters matching the key values within the supplied parameters Map.
        Returns:
        The List of resulting Entities.
        Throws:
        PersistenceOperationException - if a JPA-related exception occurred while performing the operation.
